sentences.english: The chalk headland of Beachy Head near Eastbourne in East Sussex. (Jason Hawkes)
sentences.chinese: 東薩西克斯近伊斯特本的多沙礫海角。

sentences.english: The prospector panned off bits of sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.
sentences.chinese: 探礦者淘選從河牀中挖出的少量含金泥砂和沙礫。

sentences.english: Opposite the islet, the beach consisted first of sand, covered with black stones, which were now appearing little by little above the retreating tide.
sentences.chinese: 小島對面海灘的最低層是沙礫，上面散佈着黑石頭。

sentences.english: Her feet scrunch on the gravel .
sentences.chinese: 她的腳喀嚓喀嚓地踩在沙礫上。

sentences.english: Local governments are responsible for salting and gritting roads as they freeze.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府有責任在道路結冰時撒上鹽和沙礫。

sentences.english: Pitted anvil surfaces may be refinished with 600 grit paper .
sentences.chinese: 鐵砧表面的凹痕可能要用600沙礫紙打磨。

sentences.english: A satellite image of the sands and seaweed in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 一幅關於巴哈馬沙礫和水草的衛星圖像。

sentences.english: A thick porous chalk subsoil covered with marl, clay or sand.
sentences.chinese: 粗稠的，上面蓋有泥灰，沙礫和粘土的底層土。

sentences.english: Who was shovelling up the piles of dirt and grit left in the melted snow by the side of the road?
sentences.chinese: 又是誰把融化了的雪裏的一堆堆爛泥和沙礫鏟到路邊？

sentences.english: Pour some gravel into the bottom of your pot for drainage.
sentences.chinese: 倒些沙礫在你地裏的底部以用來排水。

sentences.english: I expect they'll be gritting the roads tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我預料他們今晚要在路面上撒沙礫。

sentences.english: There was stage smoke and glitter grit on the runway.
sentences.chinese: 在展示臺上有舞臺煙幕和閃光的沙礫。

sentences.english: Asleep in the sand with the ocean washing over.
sentences.chinese: 在受大海沖刷的沙礫中沉睡。

definition: insect or insect-like small creature (literary)/base person (used as a curse word)
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
